name: Git Workspace
description: Intelligent Git workspace management with AI-guided file operations, read-only Git integration, and performance-optimized file indexing.
long_description: A comprehensive MCP server that provides AI assistants with secure, intelligent access to Git repositories. Features include atomic file operations, intelligent workflow guidance, fast file indexing, read-only Git operations, and comprehensive security validation. Designed to prevent file corruption and guide LLMs toward safe editing practices while maintaining high performance even on large projects.

workspace_path.title: Git Workspace Directory
workspace_path.description: Select the root directory of your Git repository. This should contain a .git folder and be the main project directory you want to work with.

enable_file_indexing.title: Enable Fast File Indexing
enable_file_indexing.description: Build an index of all files for faster searching. Recommended for large projects. May take a few seconds on first run.

max_file_size_mb.title: Maximum File Size (MB)
max_file_size_mb.description: Maximum file size to process. Files larger than this will be skipped to prevent performance issues.

debug_mode.title: Enable Debug Logging
debug_mode.description: Enable detailed logging for troubleshooting. Only enable when debugging issues.

features: Intelligent file editing workflow that prevents line number guessing
Performance-optimized file indexing with smart directory filtering
Read-only Git operations for safe repository analysis
Automatic backup and corruption protection during file edits
Comprehensive error handling with recovery guidance
